title: LOL client loading issues
body:
when launching the client the home screen comes up with the play button, but when i click the play button the client disappears like normal but the login screen never appears. i look in my task manager to see what processes are opened and i see the following opened; LOlClient.exe, LolLauncher.exe and LolPatcher.exe. ive had this problem before and done the process where you do the following;
Open up the "RADS" folder.
Open up the "Projects" folder.
Open up the "lol_air_client" folder.
Open up the "releases" folder.
Open up the folder that's in there. It changes every patch, but contains the same stuff.
Delete the two files named "S_OK" and "release manifest"
Open up the "deploy" folder.
Delete the "logs", "META-INF", "lol.properties", and "LoLClient.exe"
Restart your Patcher.

it has worked all the time up until now where the client does the repatch and the problem that i mentioned above happens again when i open up the client. i think that the programs are actually running but just in the background.

i have no idea how to fix this please someone help!!!!!

replies.body:
Well considering what you've done already, could you try doing a complete reinstall? Uninstall League from your computer, restart it, and install League once again. Should fix any nonsense like this from happening, as the dependencies will be re-initiated.

Best of luck.
just did a repair on the client as well and still hasn't fixed the issue
